articles.author: AP
articles.title: Euro 2020: Patrik Schick scores ‘goal of the tournament’ with 50-yard wonder strike - The Indian Express
articles.description: Patrik Schick scored the goal against Scotland from near the halfway line in his team’s opening European Championship match.
articles.content:
Patrik Schick spotted the goalkeeper off his line, launched a looping shot from just inside the halfway line, and gave his team a two-goal lead it wouldn’t relinquish.
Schick scored both goals for t… [+2557 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Football: Sterling gives England opening Euro 2020 win over Croatia - CNA
articles.description: LONDON: Raheem Sterling finally found his tournament touch when his 61st-minute goal gave England a deserved 1-0 win over Croatia at Wembley on Sunday (Jun 13) as they began a European Championship with a victory for the first time in nine attempts.
